description.en:
BattleRoyaleToken aims to offer permission-less Esports Tournaments - a platform ecosystem with tools to enhance the way gamers earn online. BRToken aims to promote a fair playing field and inclusivity at a global scale for all gamers.

$BRTK ,which is the underlying utility token can be used to interact with all our Dapps(Distributed Applications). End users are able to utilize $BRTK to participate in gaming tournaments, tip their favourite gamer and Purchase or mint NFTs.

Our vision is to create a stable economy that rewards the participant first, create excitement for the everyday gamer , while educating them on the technology they're interacting with in order to establish a high retention rate.

Other use cases for BRToken is our Staking & AMM Dapp.By locking in any amount of $BRTK for a period of time users are rewarded with more tokens(minting) while supporting the growth of the project. $BRTK can be paired with other tokens in exchange for Liquidity Provider Tokens (LP) which can be staked in both the staking and AMM Dapp.
